tool_description: PACER automation for law firms. https://bkdata.com/api
name: PACER BK Data
title: PACER BK Data

api_list.name: Data Request
api_list.description: Will pull data from all districts associated with your account for the past 30 days.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pacer-bk-data.p.rapidapi.com/apiq/data/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pacer-bk-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pacer-bk-data.p.rapidapi.com/apiq/data/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pacer-bk-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
